src:
Deseti trojni dvojček Luke Dončića v ligi NBA
02 Nov 2019, 11:34 by STA

Slovenski košarkarski fenomen Luka Dončić pri svojih komaj 20 letih s sijajnimi predstavami onstran Atlantika na novo piše zgodovino severnoameriške košarkarske lige. Ljubljančan je prišel do svojega desetega kariernega trojnega dvojčka, kar je največ v ligi NBA pri košarkarjih, ki še niso dopolnili 21. rojstnega dne.



Foto: Anze Malovrh/STA

DALLAS > Dončićevo moštvo Dallas Mavericks je sicer izgubilo proti ekipi Los Angeles Lakers po podaljšku s 110:119.
Nosilca igre pri obeh moštvih sta na tekmi dosegla trojnega dvojček. Dončić je v 38 minutah pod obročema vpisal 31 točk, 15 asistenc in 13 skokov, njegov super zvezdniški tekmec v vrstah jezernikov LeBron James pa 39 točk, 16 asistenc in 12 skokov.
Ekipa Lakers je s štirimi zmagami na petih tekmah skupaj z ekipo San Antonio Spurs na vrhu lestvice zahodne konference. Dallas je s tremi zmagami in dvema porazoma v skupini petih ekip tik pod najboljšo peterico zahoda.
Ogorčen boj je pustil tudi posledico. Novinarji, ki spremljajo Dallas, poročajo, da je Dončić dobil tri šive, s katerimi so mu zašili raztrganino, ki jo je utrpel v predelu glave.
text:
Luke Doncic's tenth triple-double in the NBA
02 Nov 2019, 11:34 by STA

Slovene basketball phenomenon Luka Doncic, at barely 20 years old, is re-writing the history of the North American Basketball League with brilliant performances across the Atlantic. The Ljubljana man has reached his tenth career triple-double, the highest in the NBA in basketball that has not yet completed his 21st birthday.



Photo: Anze Malovrh / STA

DALLAS> Doncic's Dallas Mavericks lost to the Los Angeles Lakers after an extra time of 110: 119.
The winners of both teams scored triple twins in the match. Doncic recorded 31 points, 15 assists and 13 rebounds in 38 minutes under the hoops, and his superstar rival in the LeBron James Lake ranks had 39 points, 16 assists and 12 rebounds.
With four wins in five games, the Lakers are on top of the Western Conference standings with the San Antonio Spurs. With three wins and two defeats in the five-team group, Dallas is just below the top five in the West.
The bitter struggle also left a consequence. Reporters accompanying Dallas report that Doncic was given three stitches to help him sew up the tear he suffered in the head area.
